sn1.65:1.1: “By what is the world held in bondage?
sn1.65:1.2: What is its means of travelling about?
sn1.65:1.3: What is it that one must forsake
sn1.65:2.1: “The world is held in bondage by delight;
sn1.65:2.2: Thought is its means of travelling about.
sn1.65:2.3: Craving is what one must forsake
